name: FooCat Live Wallpaper
summary:
This is a Live Wallpaper application.
The cat lead a freewheeling life on your display.
When you double tap the cat, milk, food, cleaning tools, toys buttons are displayed.
Also, When you click the [SETTINGS] button, you can select cat and background.
My app cat series : BathingCat
info:
• 平台: Android
  • 游戏类型: Wallpaper
  • 开发者: sugitom
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 售价: free
  • 官方网站: http://sugitom.blogspot.com/
